### Idiom: 大喜过望
### Meaning: 谓结果比原来希望的更好，因而感到特别高兴。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 本片还获颁第70届金球奖最佳动画片、第66届英国电影学院奖最佳动画片、第85届奥斯卡金像奖最佳动画片奖等奖项。《勇敢传说》这部动作冒险电影的主要场景是中世纪的苏格兰高地，讲述的联盟邓布罗赫家族的故事：当地的联盟国王佛格与艾琳诺皇后育有一名独生女梅莉达，梅莉达有著醒目的橘红色蓬松卷发，个性外向急躁，她在六岁生日时获得父亲赠送一组弓箭而大喜过望，开始勤练弓箭技巧，期许未来成为能够被众人称为一个很厉害的弓箭手，然而这与她母亲艾琳诺皇后希望女儿成为举止端庄的公主并早日出嫁的愿望相背，也使得梅莉达与母亲经常因想法不同而发生争执。某天梅莉达在树林冒险取箭期间，不巧遇见了一缕幽火，稍后一头巨大的恶魔黑熊莫杜袭击了这家人，梅莉达与艾琳诺连忙骑乘马匹逃走，佛格则和手下联合抵挡黑熊的攻势，此次事件也造成佛格永久失去一条腿。
target: The film also won the 70th Golden Globe Award for Best Animated Film, the 66th British Academy Film Awards for Best Animated Film, and the 85th Academy Awards for Best Animated Film. The main setting of the action-adventure movie "Brave" is the medieval Scottish Highlands. It tells the story of the Dunbroch family of the Alliance: the local Alliance King Fogg and Queen Elinor have an only daughter, Merida. Da has eye-catching orange-red fluffy curly hair and an outgoing and impetuous personality. She was overjoyed when her father presented her with a set of bows and arrows on her sixth birthday. She began to practice bow and arrow skills diligently, hoping to become a very powerful archer in the future. However, This was contrary to her mother, Queen Elinor, who wanted her daughter to become a well-behaved princess and get married as soon as possible. It also caused Merida and her mother to often argue over different ideas. One day, while Merida was venturing into the woods to retrieve arrows, she happened to encounter a wisp of ghost fire. Later, a huge demonic black bear, Modu, attacked the family. Merida and Elinor quickly escaped on horses, and Fogg Ze and his men jointly resisted the black bear's attack. This incident also caused Fogg to permanently lose one of his legs.

context:
### Idiom: 杀鸡取卵
### Meaning: 比喻贪图眼前微小好处而损害长远利益。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 提高政治站位，关键在于去掉内心的私欲，激发挖掘那一颗全心全意为人民服务的心，这就是致良知。相对于全国，地方固然是局部，但是相对于辖区，地方又何尝不是整体?一些地方，取利一时的短视决策寻常可见，杀鸡取卵的短期行为时有发生，莫不与缺少战略思维有关。一要提高政治站位，学会从政治上看问题，站稳政治立场、把准政治方向、增强政治定力、锤炼政治品格，始终牢记政治责任，做政治上的明白人。
target: Raising the political position is to remove the selfish desires in the heart and arouse the exploration of the heart that is fully committed to serving the people. This is the appeal to the conscience. Relatively speaking, the local government is a local part, but relatively speaking, the local government is also the whole. Some local governments are short-sighted decisions that seek immediate profits, and the killing of chickens for eggs is a short-term behavior that occurs from time to time. All of them are related to the lack of strategic thinking. First, it is necessary to raise the political position, learn to view problems from a political perspective, stand firmly in the political position, grasp the political direction, strengthen the political will, and improve the political quality. Always remember political responsibility and be a political person.

### Idiom: 有教无类
### Meaning: 类：类别。不管什么人都可以受到教育。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 会否自立门户签新人？坤哥说：‘不会了，都未管理好自己，宁愿将毕生功力传授开去，作育英才，开始有些同事蔡洁、江嘉敏都提出来上课。’他笑言专收‘魔音’学生，知道无线蕴藏好多‘魔音’，包括李佳芯、冯盈盈、郭柏妍等，好欢迎教她们唱歌，‘有教无类，唱歌最紧要基本技巧和感情，我唱了10几年，有些经验和心得，只要大家肯学就得，会努力将不可能变有可能，证明自己实力’。爱雀受欢迎 Toby启发商机。
target: Will he sign up newcomers? Kwong said: "No, I can't manage myself well, so I would rather pass on my life-long skills and foster talents, and some of my colleagues, such as Chia Chia and Gong Ka Man also suggested to teach a class. " He jokingly said that he only accepts "magic voice" students, because he knows that TVB has many "magic voice" singers, including Li Jia Xin, Feng Ying Ying and Guo Bei Yan, and he welcomed teaching them singing, "There is no class like this, singing requires basic techniques and feelings, I have been singing for 10 years, and I have some experience and feelings, as long as they are willing to learn, I will try my best to make the impossible possible, to prove my ability. " Toby was inspired by the opportunity.

target: He made his debut for Hong Kong team in the exhibition match against the Singapore player team in July of the same year. Mo Xiaoling is the brother of the Hong Kong star Mo Xiaoxuan. Before he was a child star, he had filmed more than 20 to 30 films. His works include The Tears of the Lonely Little Bird, Spring Dreams and so on. He also performed with well-known actors such as Zhou Wenchi and the Red-line Woman. He was also the concubine of Zou Wenji, the coach of Yuen Long.

### Idiom: 戴罪立功
### Meaning: 谓判了罪而给予立功赎罪的机会。也泛指犯罪后立功赎罪。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 孩子越是废物，越会抱着“原生家庭”“童年缺爱”两大法宝不放，因为实在是太好用的口袋罪名，只要祭出这两个罪，父母便望风披靡，只好戴罪立功，给房给钱，养着这废物。
target: The more useless a child is, the more he will hold on to the two magic weapons of "original family" and "lack of love in childhood", because they are really easy to use as pocket crimes. As long as these two crimes are used, the parents will be invincible and have no choice but to make meritorious deeds. Give me money for a house and keep this trash.

### Idiom: 自寻烦恼
### Meaning: 自找的烦闷苦恼。意思是，本来不该有烦闷苦恼。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 水瓶座：好人有好报，热心助人，有助收获好人缘。双鱼座：没必要跟别人作比较，跟自寻烦恼没分别。
target: Aquarius: Good people get good rewards. Be kind to others and you will be rewarded with good relationships. Pisces: There is no need to compare yourself with others. It is not worthwhile.

### Idiom: 救人一命，胜造七级浮屠
### Meaning: 指救人性命功德无量。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 意思是为死去的人造塔，毕竟不如“救人一命”的功德更大，更有意义，故俗语云：“救人一命，胜造七级浮屠”。
target: The meaning is that building towers for the dead is not as meritorious or meaningful as saving a life. Hence, there is a saying: "Saving a life is better than building a seven-story pagoda."

### Idiom: 逸兴遄飞
### Meaning: 指超逸豪放的意兴勃发飞扬。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 舟凡五艘，中有滊动机名约见取丸，先一小时启航。团员争先登舟者凡二十七人，是日，天气晴朗，薰风习习，仰观宇宙之大，俯瞰沧溟之远，游目骋怀，逸兴遄飞，致足乐也。。岂意乐未极而悲生，景未观而祸起，忽而黑云四赽，而天地晦冥；风雨骤至，而浊浪排空。
target: There were five boats, and the one with the steam engine was called "Yaoyuan". The boat set sail one hour earlier. Twenty-seven members of the group rushed to board the boat. The weather was clear that day, and the breeze was gentle. Looking up at the vast expanse of the universe, and looking down at the vast expanse of the ocean, the viewers' eyes wandered and their minds wandered. The joy was not yet at its peak, but disaster was already imminent. The black clouds suddenly appeared, and the sky and earth became dark and gloomy. The wind and rain came suddenly, and the turbid waves swept away the boat.

### Idiom: 神不知鬼不觉
### Meaning: 指形迹隐秘，不为人知。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: weibo
source: “摩羯”用“忙”来推开所有的约会，恨不得把一辈子的工作都拿出来忙完，为的就是尽快恢复单身。“天秤”渣的神不知鬼不觉，天秤会悄悄的厌倦，悄悄的找到新欢，悄悄的使用冷暴力逼你提分手。
target: Capricorns use "busy" to push away all appointments, wishing they could finish their whole life's work in order to be single as soon as possible. "Libra" is a scumbag without even realizing it. Libra will quietly get tired of you, quietly find a new love, and quietly use cold violence to force you to break up.

### Idiom: 身家性命
### Meaning: 全家的生命和财产。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 洪秀全当众说道：“洪某到贵省来，不过为传播道理，别无他意。非是洪某好事，实是事势不得不如此也！”各人听罢，皆大呼道：“人生在世，那有不爱身家性命？愿听洪先生指挥！”当下众口齐声，声如雷动。谁想虎狼官吏，不能捕盗安民，反来攻击诸君。
target: Hong Xiuquan publicly said, "When Hong came to your province, I just wanted to spread the truth. I had no other intentions. It wasn't that I was doing something good, but that the situation forced me to do so!" After everyone heard this, they all shouted, "How can people in this world not love their families and lives? We are willing to follow Mr. Hong's orders!" At that moment, everyone's voice was like thunder. Who would have thought that the tiger and wolf officials could not catch thieves and keep the people safe, but instead came to attack you all?

### Idiom: 走投无路
### Meaning: 无路可走。比喻陷入绝境，没有出路。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 也遇到了个“沙雕同事”，觉得他说的话都很精辟，挺搞笑的。18岁，路还很长，不到走投无路应该都不会进厂。前几天还在上班，负责人跟我问我回学校是继续上学还是直接毕业，可能是想让我再干一段时间吧，我只能笑着说不会来了。
target: Met a "stupid colleague" as well, thought his words were profound and quite funny. 18, the road ahead is long, and I won't go into the factory unless I'm at a dead end. I was still working a few days ago, and the leader asked me if I would go back to school or graduate directly, maybe he wanted me to work for a while longer, and I could only smile and say I wouldn't come back.

context:
### Idiom: 嫣然一笑
### Meaning: 形容娇媚的微笑。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 女孩问：你写不写？我当下赧然苦笑，先伸出自认有点仙风道骨的左手，接著再伸出打了30多年网球，关节早已肿胀变形的右手，女孩立刻善解人意嫣然一笑，我戳戳岿然挺立的中指跟食指，再点点其他三指说：这就像希特勒的地堡沦陷（困兽犹斗）女孩立刻收起笑脸说：在我们国家不能随便谈论他。
target: The girl asked: Do you want to write? I smiled bitterly and first stretched out my left hand, which I thought was a little bit fairy-like, and then stretched out my right hand, which had been playing tennis for more than 30 years and whose joints had been swollen and deformed. The girl immediately smiled empathetically and I poked the middle finger that stood firm and straight. Point her index finger and then the other three fingers and say: This is like Hitler’s bunker falling (the trapped beast still fights). The girl immediately put away her smile and said: You can’t talk about him casually in our country.

### Meaning: ①形容被火烧伤得很严重。②指牺牲惨重。③喻处境狼狈或十分窘迫。

target: I have a pile of reports to do, and I'm extremely busy. But at this moment, my colleague A suddenly discovered a huge sum of money.

context:
### Idiom: 沆瀣一气
### Meaning: 宋钱易《南部新书》戊集载，唐代崔瀣参加科举考试，被考官崔沆录取。当时有人嘲笑说：“座主门生，沆瀣一气。”后用以喻气味相投的人联结在一起。多用于贬义。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 在中天【中天朋友圈｜哏传媒】开节目散布消息，说两岸一旦发生战争，不要相信政府官员和首长，说国军没有抵抗力，说不要相信民防，告诉大家不要抵抗，被敌军侵略只是换个政府而已。然后底下留言统派和中国网民沆瀣一气，希望中国赶快打来？ 2016年1月20日，在2016年中国大陆网友“出征”Facebook事件中，有台湾网友引用之前蔡正元记者会时称蔡英文为“蔡姐姐”，该网友称蔡正元为蔡英文的弟弟，因而误导许多中国大陆网友来攻击蔡正元脸书。
target: On the platform of "Central Sky Circle" of "Gan Media", a program was opened to spread the news that if a war breaks out across the Taiwan Strait, do not believe in government officials and leaders, saying that the National Army has no resistance, do not believe in civil defense, and tell everyone not to resist, and that being invaded by the enemy is just a change of government. Then the comments below were in cahoots with unification advocates and Chinese netizens, hoping that China would come over soon? On January 20, 2016, in the event of "Chinese netizens invading Facebook" in 2016, a Taiwanese netizen quoted that蔡英文 was called "Auntie蔡" by Cai Zhengyuan during a previous press conference, and the netizen called Cai Zhengyuan the younger brother of Cai Yingwen, thus misleading many mainland Chinese netizens to attack Cai Zhengyuan's Facebook.

### Idiom: 白眼相看
### Meaning: 看别人时眼睛朝上或旁边，现出白眼珠，表示轻蔑，不屑一顾，对人不礼貌。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 【平常语·甘露味】不要怪生活有时候会故意拉长了脸，冷嘲热讽，白眼相看。生活真的想给机会让你明白，这世间风一阵雨一阵，烦恼一直有去有来，旧的放下，新的又捡起，没有什么能一直存在。
target: [Ordinary Words·Sweet Dew Flavor] Don't blame life for sometimes deliberately putting on a long face, making sarcastic remarks, and giving you cold looks. Life truly wants to give you the opportunity to understand that in this world, the wind blows and the rain falls intermittently, troubles come and go, the old is put down, the new is picked up, nothing can exist forever.

### Idiom: 解民倒悬
### Meaning: 解解救；倒悬人被倒挂，比喻处境困难、危急。比喻把受苦难的人民解救出来。

source: 目前《临高启明》实体书已出版前两卷，第一、二卷分别由中国广播影视出版社和现代出版社出版。五百余名当代社会各行各业的失意青年，统称为“五百众”或“五百废”，穿越者中有人想称王称霸，有人想解民倒悬，有人想阻止清朝崛起，也有人只想在古代过腐败的享乐主义生活。经过一系准备工作，穿越者在二零某某年的9月乘坐丰城轮，携带大量现代工业设备，通过一个虫洞，来到明末崇祯年代的海南临高县，从一片空白建设工业文明，并逐步制霸全球。
target: Currently, the first two volumes of the book "Longing Initiate" have been published, the first and second volumes by Chinese Radio and Television and Modern Publishers. The 500 contemporary unemployed young men, collectively known as "The Five Hundred" or "The Five Lost", journeyed back into the modern society to become a king, a prince, a martyr, a martyr of his people, a martyr to the country, a martyr to a man, a martyr to a woman, a martyr to a man, a martyr to a woman, a martyr to a man, a martyr to a man, a martyr to a woman, a martyr to a man, a martyr ### Idiom: 饕风虐雪
### Meaning: 指狂暴肆虐的风雪。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 通辽市广大干部群众面对饕风虐雪，24小时连轴转，人休车不休，打通雪阻道路，营救被困人员……抗击这场当地有气象记录以来的.强暴风雪，他们就是这样拼！
target: The cadres and the masses in Tongliao City faced the fierce wind and snow. They drove around 24 hours a day, people parked their cars, opened up the snow-blocked roads, and rescued the trapped people... This is how they fought to fight the strongest snowstorm since the local weather records began!

context:
### Idiom: 挂羊头，卖狗肉
### Meaning: 挂着羊头，卖的却是狗肉。比喻以好的名义做招牌，实际上兜售低劣的货色。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 2018年，全屋整装将继续领跑装修市场。许多家装公司现在处于“挂羊头，卖狗肉”的状态，没有真正的实力。在全屋集成整装十大排名中，轻舟装饰全屋整装品牌拥有很高的知名度，是一个热门的家装品牌。
target: In 2018, whole-house renovation will continue to lead the decoration market. Many home decoration companies are now in a "sheep's head, dog meat" situation, without real strength. Among the top ten rankings of whole-house integrated renovations, Light Boat Decoration whole-house renovation brand has a high reputation and is a popular home decoration brand.

context:
### Idiom: 煞有介事
### Meaning: 谓故作姿态，让人感到一本正经、真有其事。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 现在，35岁已经是一道坎了？电视剧《平凡之路》里，称35岁是中年人的一道坎。有人煞有介事地分析，有身体上、工作上和家庭上的原因。身体上，35岁，身体机能可能开始衰退，不如年轻时状态好，以前能冲能打，熬个通宵第二天精神抖擞，现在熬一宿可能需要几天调整。
target: Now, 35 is already a threshold? In the TV series "Ordinary Road", 35 is described as a threshold for middle-aged people. Some people seriously analyze that there are physical, work, and family reasons. Physically, at the age of 35, the body function may start to decline and is not as good as when young. In the past, you could rush and fight, and after staying up all night, you would be energetic the next day. Now, after staying up all night, you may need several days to adjust.

context:
### Idiom: 言有尽而意无穷
### Meaning: 指诗文含义深刻，令人品味不尽。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 晚唐时流行的一部说诗杂著《琉璃堂墨客图》，尊称王昌龄为“诗天子”。南宋严羽认为王昌龄诗可说是透彻玲珑，无迹可求，言有尽而意无穷。明清时的诗评家推许《出塞》其一（秦时明月汉时关）为唐人七绝的压卷之作，是唐代七绝第一。
target: The last of the famous poetry compilations of the late 唐, 《琉璃堂墨客图》, recognized Wang Sang-ling as "诗天子". 南宋严羽 believed Wang Sang-ling's poems were "透彻玲珑,无迹可求,言尽而意无穷." The early Ming and Qing poetry editors believed "出塞"其一(秦时明月汉时关) is the leading of the 唐人七绝, the first of the 唐代 七绝.

context:
### Idiom: 眠花醉柳
### Meaning: 比喻狎妓。同眠花宿柳”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: weibo
source: 眠花醉柳，西风下酒，此刻倒是羡慕了史湘云。
target: The willows are drunk with sleeping flowers, and the wine is drunk by the west wind. At this moment, I am envious of Shi Xiangyun.

context:
### Idiom: 戴罪立功
### Meaning: 谓判了罪而给予立功赎罪的机会。也泛指犯罪后立功赎罪。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 随着社会不断发展，现代生活日新月异，诸如网络安全、冻卵技术、基因识别、直播带货、校园霸凌、正当防卫等新的社会问题层出不穷，相关案件也频频发生，这必然要求法律条令的不断修订完善。不唯如此，作为律师，不仅要维护他得到公正审判的权利，还要劝说他主动认清真相，戴罪立功。剧中精心设计的案例，不仅是剧中人面临的问题，也是当前社会的集体关切，具有代表性和警示意义。
target: With the continuous development of society, modern life is changing rapidly, and new social problems such as network security, freezing eggs, genetic identification, live-streaming sales, school bullying, and self-defense are emerging one after another. Related cases are also frequently occurring, which inevitably requires the continuous revision and improvement of legal regulations. Not only that, as a lawyer, you not only need to maintain his right to fair trial, but also persuade him to actively recognize the truth and make amends. The cases carefully designed in the play are not only the problems faced by the characters in the play, but also the collective concerns of current society, with representative significance and warning significance.

context:
### Idiom: 豪放不羁
### Meaning: 气魄大而不受拘束。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 中国的上层和底层太割裂了，人和人之间的思想觉悟太割裂了。真的你能想象到几千年前几百年前的历史人物是怎样的俊逸潇洒，豪放不羁。那些文字、诗歌、思想、历史从来都和穷人无关。
target: The gap between China's upper and lower classes is too great, and the gap in people's understanding of the world is too great. Can you really imagine what kind of handsome and unrestrained figures historical figures thousands or hundreds of years ago were? Those words, poetry, ideas, and history have never had anything to do with the poor.

context:
### Idiom: 灭绝人性
### Meaning: 完全丧失人所具有的理性。形容极端残忍，象野兽一样。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 十大灭绝人性人体试验。
target: Ten of the worst humanity experiments.

context:
### Idiom: 韬晦之计
### Meaning: 韬把才华隐藏起来；晦不让人知道自己的踪迹。指隐藏才能，不使外露。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 不是懦弱、可欺，任人宰割。而是一种忍让、一种韬晦之计。
target: It's not about being weak or vulnerable, allowing others to manipulate. Instead, it is a form of tolerance, a strategy of keeping a low profile.

context:
### Idiom: 唯妙唯肖
### Meaning: 形容描写或模仿得非常巧妙，非常逼真。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 你今天问AI了吗？这段时间chat GPT席卷了我们的生活，其实AI技术发展许久，突然如火山迸发于日常后，我们才发现，原来AI技术已经如此成熟。你还记得已逝歌手邓丽君‘惊喜现身’、在舞台上与周杰伦高歌的景象吗？唯妙唯肖的神韵让人十足赞叹，也纷纷好奇到底是怎么办到的？原来这项惊人的成果出自好莱坞知名视效公司数字王国Digital Domain之手，而背后领军的人竟是正港的台湾囝仔。好莱坞电影的幕后推手，精彩视效成就时代经典。
target: Have you asked AI today? Recently, chat GPT has swept our lives. In fact, AI technology has been developing for a long time. Only when it suddenly erupted in our daily lives, did we realize that AI technology has become so mature. Do you still remember the scene of the late singer Teresa Teng 'surprisingly appearing' and singing on stage with Jay Chou? The lifelike charm made people fully admire and curious about how it was done. It turns out that this amazing achievement comes from the well-known Hollywood visual effects company Digital Domain, and the person leading behind is actually a genuine Taiwanese guy. The behind-the-scenes pusher of Hollywood movies, brilliant visual effects create timeless classics.

context:
### Idiom: 嫣然一笑
### Meaning: 形容娇媚的微笑。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 女孩问：你写不写？我当下赧然苦笑，先伸出自认有点仙风道骨的左手，接著再伸出打了30多年网球，关节早已肿胀变形的右手，女孩立刻善解人意嫣然一笑，我戳戳岿然挺立的中指跟食指，再点点其他三指说：这就像希特勒的地堡沦陷（困兽犹斗）女孩立刻收起笑脸说：在我们国家不能随便谈论他。
target: The girl asked me if I could write, and I immediately sighed, then stood up with my left hand, then my right hand, which had played tennis for 30 years, and had become sore and stiff, I said: It's like Hitler's bunker being taken over (slaughtered), the girl immediately closed her smile, and said: In our country, it's not allowed to speak of him.

context:
### Idiom: 敲榨勒索
### Meaning: 依仗势力或抓籽柄进行恐吓，用威胁手段索取财物。同敲诈勒索”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 当地的贫苦农民受够地主剥削的苦，渴望得到土地，听了这个宣传，纷纷参加了白莲教。一些官吏本来是敲榨勒索的老手，趁机派出差役，挨家挨户地查问，不管你是不是教徒，都得拿出一笔钱来孝敬他们。乾隆帝命令各省宫府捉拿教徒。
target: The local impoverished farmers had had enough of the landlord's exploitation and longed for their own land. After hearing this propaganda, they joined the White Lotus Sect in droves. Some officials, who were old hands at extortion, took the opportunity to send out bailiffs to inquire from house to house. Regardless of whether you were a follower or not, you had to pay them a sum of money as a tribute. Emperor Qianlong ordered the provincial palaces to arrest the followers.
